meanings.definition: Arranged in or consisting of bundles
meanings.sent1: The fascicular roots of the plant were neatly grouped together.
meanings.sent2: The fascicular pattern of the branches made the tree look organized.
meanings.sent3: The fascicular arrangement of my socks in the drawer made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her fascicular approach to organizing files was like a well-orchestrated symphony.
meanings.sent5: The fascicular structure of the spider web was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: A small bundle or cluster, especially of nerve or muscle fibers
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed out the fascicular cluster on the nerve diagram.
meanings.sent2: She studied the fascicular bundles under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The fascicular group of kittens playing together was adorable.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts formed a fascicular tangle, hard to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The fascicular unit of soldiers moved in perfect unison.
